SEARCH
Package entity

Class InternshipOpportunity

java.lang.Object
entity.InternshipOpportunity
public class InternshipOpportunity extends Object
Internship Opportunity entity class representing an internship posting. Represents an internship opportunity created by company representatives.

Key features and workflow:

  • Created by Company Representatives (up to 5 per representative)
  • Maximum of 10 slots per internship opportunity
  • Status workflow: Pending → Approved → Filled (or Rejected)
  • Must be approved by Career Center Staff before visible to students
  • Visibility can be toggled on/off by Company Representative
  • Students can only apply when status is "Approved" and visibility is "on"
  • Cannot accept applications after closing date or when status is "Filled"
  • Level determines eligibility: Year 1-2 students can only apply to Basic level
  • Preferred major filters which students can see and apply

    Constructs a new Internship Opportunity with the specified details Initializes with PENDING status, not visible, and no filled slots Total slots cannot exceed 10 as per system requirements

  • Constructor Details

    • InternshipOpportunity

      public InternshipOpportunity(String internshipID, String title, String description, InternshipLevel level, Major preferredMajor, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate, String companyName, String companyRepresentativeID, int totalSlots, int filledSlots)
      Constructs a new Internship Opportunity with the specified details Initializes with PENDING status, not visible, and no filled slots Total slots cannot exceed 10 as per system requirements
      Parameters:
      internshipID - unique internship identifier
      title - internship position title
      description - detailed description of the internship
      level - internship level (Basic, Intermediate, Advanced)
      preferredMajor - preferred major for applicants (filters eligibility)
      openingDate - application opening date
      closingDate - application closing date
      companyName - company offering the internship
      companyRepresentativeID - ID of representative who created this opportunity
      totalSlots - total number of available slots (max 10)
